title: Acoustic Analogue for Quantum Field Theory with a Source term
abstract:
We propose a non-relativistic fluid analogue model for a scalar field coupled
to a classical source. The generic analogue gravity model involves the phonon
field which is coupled to the acoustic metric. We work in the special
relativity limit of the acoustic analogue. By assuming a time dependent
external potential on the fluid system, we are able to model a source term for
the scalar field. Upon quantisation, phonon creation due to the source is
studied.
